__e: Detective Bell and I are going to speak with him.
The people who were here earlier--
Well, I'll just have to go back to Mike Bell and tell him the truth.
People, Detective Bell, are not you and me.
Please, Bell, I don't want to hear about another amazing moonrise when I'm never gonna be able to see one.
And you and Mr Bell, you weren't the greatest of friends, were you?
